TransferToOtherRealEstate.description: Value transferred from mortgage loans to real estate owned (REO) in noncash transactions.

TreasuryStockCommonShares.label: Treasury Stock, Common, Shares
TreasuryStockCommonShares.description: Number of previously issued common shares repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury.

TreasuryStockCommonValue.label: Treasury Stock, Common, Value
TreasuryStockCommonValue.description: Amount allocated to previously issued common shares repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury.

TreasuryStockShares.label: Treasury Stock, Shares
TreasuryStockShares.description: Number of common and preferred shares that were previously issued and that were repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury on the financial statement date. This stock has no voting rights and receives no dividends.

TreasuryStockValue.label: Treasury Stock, Value
TreasuryStockValue.description: The amount allocated to treasury stock. Treasury stock is common and preferred shares of an entity that were issued, repurchased by the entity, and are held in its treasury.

TreasuryStockValueAcquiredCostMethod.label: Treasury Stock, Value, Acquired, Cost Method
TreasuryStockValueAcquiredCostMethod.description: Equity impact of the cost of common and preferred stock that were repurchased during the period. Recorded using the cost method.

UnrealizedGainLossOnInvestments.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Investments
UnrealizedGainLossOnInvestments.description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Income Tax Penalties and Interest Accrued
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.description: Amount accrued for interest on an underpayment of income taxes and penalties related to a tax position claimed or expected to be claimed in the tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Income Tax Penalties and Interest Expense
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.description: Amount of expense for interest on an underpayment of income taxes and penalties related to a tax position claimed or expected to be claimed in the tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Current Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions that have been or will be taken in current period tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsReductionsResulti.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Reduction Resulting from Lapse of Applicable Statute of Limitations
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsReductionsResulti.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from lapses of applicable statutes of limitations.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsThatWouldImpactEf.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits that Would Impact Effective Tax Rate
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsThatWouldImpactEf.description: The total amount of unrecognized tax benefits that, if recognized, would affect the effective tax rate.

UnusedCommitmentsToExtendCredit.label: Unused Commitments to Extend Credit
UnusedCommitmentsToExtendCredit.description: Unused amount of commitments to extend credit to customers.

VariableLeaseCost.label: Variable Lease, Cost
VariableLeaseCost.description: Amount of variable lease cost, excluded from lease liability, recognized when obligation for payment is incurred for finance and operating leases.

WeightedAverageNumberDilutedSharesOutsta.label: Weighted Average Number Diluted Shares Outstanding Adjustment
WeightedAverageNumberDilutedSharesOutsta.description: The sum of dilutive potential common shares or units used in the calculation of the diluted per-share or per-unit computation.

WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfShareOutstandingB.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic and Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfShareOutstandingB.description: Average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating basic and diluted earnings per share (EPS).

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

CapitalizedComputerSoftwareNet.label: Capitalized Computer Software, Net
CapitalizedComputerSoftwareNet.description: The carrying amount of capitalized computer software costs net of accumulated amortization as of the balance sheet date.

CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage. Excludes amount for disposal group and discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

DirectCostsOfLeasedAndRentedPropertyOrEq.label: Direct Costs of Leased and Rented Property or Equipment
DirectCostsOfLeasedAndRentedPropertyOrEq.description: Amount of expense incurred and directly related to generating revenue by lessor from operating lease of rented property and equipment.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityUndiscounte.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, Undiscounted Excess Amount
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityUndiscounte.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments in excess of discounted obligation for lease payments for operating lease.

LessorOperatingLeaseAssumptionsAndJudgme.label: Lessor, Operating Lease, Assumptions and Judgments, Value of Underlying Asset, Amount
LessorOperatingLeaseAssumptionsAndJudgme.description: Amount lessor expects from underlying asset following end of operating lease term.

RealEstateOwnedAccumulatedDepreciation.label: Real Estate Owned, Accumulated Depreciation
RealEstateOwnedAccumulatedDepreciation.description: Amount of accumulated depreciation for real estate owned (REO).

DerivativeCollateralObligationToReturnCa.label: Derivative, Collateral, Obligation to Return Cash
DerivativeCollateralObligationToReturnCa.description: Amount of obligation to return cash collateral under master netting arrangements that have not been offset against derivative assets.

DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityAccruedInter.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-Maturity, Accrued Interest, after Allowance for Credit Loss
DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityAccruedInter.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of accrued interest on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

HeldToMaturitySecurities.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity
HeldToMaturitySecurities.description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesAccumulatedUnrec.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Accumulated Unrecognized Loss
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesAccumulatedUnrec.description: Amount of accumulated unrealized loss on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesRo.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Maturity, Allocated and Single Maturity Date, Rolling after 10 Years, Fair Value
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesRo.description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing after tenth rolling fiscal year following latest fiscal year. For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesSi.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Maturity, Allocated and Single Maturity Date, Amortized Cost
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesSi.description: Amortized cost of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date.

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesSi.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Maturity, Allocated and Single Maturity Date, Fair Value
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesSi.description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date.

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesFairValue.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Fair Value
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesFairValue.description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

HeldtomaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesRo.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Maturity, Allocated and Single Maturity Date, Rolling after 10 Years, Amortized Cost
HeldtomaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesRo.description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing after rolling tenth fiscal year following latest fiscal year. For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

InterestAndDividendIncomeSecuritiesHeldT.label: Interest Income, Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity
InterestAndDividendIncomeSecuritiesHeldT.description: Amount of operating interest income, including amortization and accretion of premiums and discounts, on held-to-maturity securities.

OffBalanceSheetCreditLossLiability.label: Off-Balance Sheet, Credit Loss, Liability
OffBalanceSheetCreditLossLiability.description: Amount of expected credit loss for credit exposure on off-balance-sheet commitment, including but not limited to, loan commitment, standby letter of credit, financial guarantee not accounted for as insurance. Excludes off-balance sheet credit exposure accounted for as insurance and instrument accounted for under derivatives and hedging.

PaymentsToAcquireHeldToMaturitySecuritie.label: Payments to Acquire Held-to-maturity Securities
PaymentsToAcquireHeldToMaturitySecuritie.description: Amount of cash outflow through purchase of long-term held-to-maturity securities.

ProceedsFromMaturitiesPrepaymentsAndCall.label: Proceeds from Maturities, Prepayments and Calls of Held-to-maturity Securities
ProceedsFromMaturitiesPrepaymentsAndCall.description: The cash inflow associated with the maturity, prepayments and calls (requests for early payments) of debt securities designated as held-to-maturity.

ReclassificationFromAociCurrentPeriodBef.label: Reclassification from AOCI, Current Period, before Tax, Attributable to Parent
ReclassificationFromAociCurrentPeriodBef.description: Amount before tax of reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent.

ReclassificationFromAociCurrentPeriodNet.label: Reclassification from AOCI, Current Period, Net of Tax, Attributable to Parent
ReclassificationFromAociCurrentPeriodNet.description: Amount after tax of reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent.

ReclassificationFromAociCurrentPeriodTax.label: Reclassification from AOCI, Current Period, Tax
ReclassificationFromAociCurrentPeriodTax.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income (loss).

BankingRegulationCommonEquityTierOneRisk.label: Banking Regulation, Common Equity Tier One Risk-Based Capital Ratio, Capital Adequacy, Minimum
BankingRegulationCommonEquityTierOneRisk.description: Ratio of minimum Common Equity Tier 1 risk-based capital to risk-weighted assets required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

BankingRegulationCommonEquityTierOneRisk.label: Banking Regulation, Common Equity Tier One Risk-Based Capital Ratio, Well Capitalized, Minimum
BankingRegulationCommonEquityTierOneRisk.description: Ratio of minimum Common Equity Tier 1 risk-based capital to risk-weighted assets categorized as well capitalized as defined by regulatory framework for prompt corrective action.

DepositsWithClearingOrganizationsAndOthe.label: Deposits with Clearing Organizations and Others, Securities
DepositsWithClearingOrganizationsAndOthe.description: The amount of securities on deposit with clearing organizations and other entities which provide services necessary to operations of the Company. This item would include, for instance, securities advanced as refundable collateral for securities borrowed.

FinancialInstrumentsOwnedAtFairValue.label: Financial Instruments, Owned, at Fair Value
FinancialInstrumentsOwnedAtFairValue.description: The aggregate fair value as of the balance sheet date of financial instruments and other positions owned by the entity including: (1) mortgages, mortgage-backed and asset backed securities; (2) US government and agency obligations; (3) state and municipal government obligations; (4) other sovereign government debt; (5) corporate obligations; (6) corporate equities; (7) principal investments; (8) derivative contracts; and (9) physical commodities. Includes both pledged and unpledged holdings.

FinancingReceivableUnamortizedLoanFeeCos.label: Financing Receivable, Unamortized Loan Fee (Cost)
FinancingReceivableUnamortizedLoanFeeCos.description: Amount of unamortized loan commitment, origination, and other fees (costs) on financing receivable. Excludes financing receivable covered under loss sharing agreement.

ProvisionForLoanLossesExpensed.label: Financing Receivable, Credit Loss, Expense (Reversal)
ProvisionForLoanLossesExpensed.description: Amount of credit loss expense (reversal of expense) for financing receivable.

CapitalizedComputerSoftwareAccumulatedAm.label: Capitalized Computer Software, Accumulated Amortization
CapitalizedComputerSoftwareAccumulatedAm.description: For each balance sheet presented, the amount of accumulated amortization for capitalized computer software costs.

DebtInstrumentInterestRateDuringPeriod.label: Debt Instrument, Interest Rate During Period
DebtInstrumentInterestRateDuringPeriod.description: The average effective interest rate during the reporting period.

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesRo.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Maturity, Allocated and Single Maturity Date, Rolling after Five Through Ten Years, Fair Value
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesRo.description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing in sixth through tenth rolling fiscal year following latest fiscal year. For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.
